item.title: Version 1.0.7
item.description:
• Added welcome screen with basic user information.
  • Created DMG installer.
  • Added automatic updates for the application.
  • Show/hide commit description field automatically in the commit view.
  • Show notification bar when repository is in merge-in-progress state.
  • Improved: Show error when targed folder is not a git repository.
  • Fixed: Click on table view item in quick open view doesn't open repository.
